title: Sales Executive
description: We are looking for a Sales Executive to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for developing and maintaining relationships with clients, identifying new business opportunities, and achieving sales targets.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain relationships with clients
Maintain records of sales, revenue, and other important metrics
requirements: 2-4 years of experience in sales, preferably in the industrial sector
Ability to build and maintain relationships
Result-oriented with a proven track record of achieving targets
Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or related field
